span.span: during these unprecedented times. Below you will find weekly family letters that provide detailed plans and information essential to facilitating a flexible learning approach

span.style: font-size: 15px; border: 1pt none windowtext; padding: 0in; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

span.span: during our Extended School Closure. Additional resources are also provided to support your child’s learning. We appreciate that this is an ongoing educational learning plan, and while we cannot replicate the classroom learning experience, we continue to design meaningful, targeted weekly learning opportunities for our students.
